subSubSection.paragraph:

Aristotelia vetusella
H.-S.’ from Kavusi.

R e m a r k s. The examined specimens are variable both in size, colour and wing markings. No barcode data is available, and it is uncertain if the material from Crete is conspecific with
S. remissella
from the type locality in Sicily – and if it includes more than one species. The genus
Stomopteryx
is in need of revision.
